DESCRIPTION: Rune cards scale with Runescarred, Retain, and you gain 1 Runescarred on use.
Rust prevents enemies from applying buffs.
Inebriated temporarily applies 4 Strength and Dexterity and randomizes card costs.
When you reach 3 Caffeine, gain 1 Energy.
At the end of your turn, heals you and reduces its value by 1.
When drawn, this card has a 50% chance to discard itself and trigger an alternate effect.
An X cost power that lowers the cost of X other cards for the rest of combat.
